Name: Monrovia
Description: Monrovia is the capital, and with a population of around 1,000,000, also the largest city in Liberia.

Name: Robertsport
Description: Robertsport is a small city and surfing destination in Northern Liberia, located 50 km north of the capital Monrovia.

Name: Harper
Description: Harper is a city in Southern Liberia.

Name: Paynesville (Liberia)
Description: Paynesville is a town in Central Liberia.
